name: Prospective Residential Foundations

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Target performance set assuming 2 inch insulation thickness and corresponding objective to develop thin, high-R insulation

installed_cost_source.notes: Target cost set based on 10 year payback period objective

product_lifetime_source.notes: Foundation continuous insulation might remain in the ground much longer than the indicated lifetime, but the lifetime is intended to indicate the period over which there should be no degradation in performance

_description: Residential foundation continuous insulation target, including retrofit of existing buildings
